duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead pre-sales product and service events, conversations, and workshop engagements with clients to guide teammates in creating a pipeline for device-as-a-service (DaaS) opportunities with Windows 11 Pro devices.
Mentor other Business Development Managers in developing sales, marketing, and technology skills to drive program goals.
Travel to deliver lunch and learn engagements at Microsoft Technology Centers and partnering Windows 11 device manufacturer locations at least twice a month.
Remotely deliver Insight Device as a Service-focused webinars at least twice a month.
Support creation and management of ongoing Windows and Device-as-a-Service go-to-market strategies.
Lead pre-sales Windows 11 Pro Device-as-a-Service conversations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from a four-year university or a combination of 3-5+ years of related professional work experience in technology consulting, sales, or partner management with endpoint management, device, or Microsoft technical certifications.
